name: Chained Together
description:
You and your homie got in jail for stealing a loaf of bread. Both of you are locked tight with big ass metal bullet-deflect chain. Use the chain and give those cops a taste of their own medicine! 

HOW TO PLAY

  • Use mouse to control player 1
  • Use AWSD or Key arrow to control player 2
  • Use the chain to whip down the enemy and structure or deflect the bullet
  • Have fun and don't rage

CREDIT

  • Background music is made with the help of QuyenJD
  • Some of the character arts are "inspired" by the game Hotline Miami. You should check it out. But most of the arts are hand-drawn during the Jam.
